text: kya unhonne nahin dekha ki unase pahale kitane hee girohon ko ham vinasht kar chuke hai. unhen hamane dharatee mein aisa jamaav pradaan kiya tha, jo tumhen nahin pradaan kiya. aur unapar hamane aakaash ko khoob barasata chhod diya aur unake neeche naharen bahaee. phir hamane aakaash ko khoob barasata chhod diya aur unake neeche naharen bahaee. phir hamane unhen unake gunaahon ke kaaran vinashtî€¼ kar diya aur unake pashchaat doosare girohon ko uthaaya
